flawed_nl_solution:
Solomon is 3*Juwan so Juwan is 1/3 of Solomon = 66/3 = 22
Levi collected half of 22 = <<22-11=11>>11
Combined the boys collected 66 + 22 + 11 = <<66+22+11=94>>94 cans in all.
#### 94

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 99, not 94. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
